data.oai_dc:dc: Locations of Clarkia xantiana ssp. xantiana populations confirmed to have long-term stochastic lambda estimates greater than 1.Easting is eastward position (longitude) in meters, UTM NAD 27 zone 11 North, and northing is northward position (latitude) in meters, UTM NAD 27 zone 11 North.
